title: Farmer Protest Media BLACKOUT! Why We Aren't Seeing It | Vandana Shiva
description:
Here's a clip with environmentalist and anti-globalist author Vandana Shiva. You can watch her documentary: ‘The Seeds of Vandana Shiva’ at https://VandanaShivaMovie.com. Here we discussed what's happening in Germany with their farmer protests & how this is happening worldwide not just in Europe. 

WATCH THE FULL UNCUT INTERVIEW ON RUMBLE
